name: Death by Dice
description:
What is "Death by dice"?

Death by dice is a small arcady bullet-hell where you play as a bug. Dodge a barrage of dice in order not to get squished and survive for as long as you can. While also collecting as many food items as possible to rack up a ton of points.

Controls:

- use the WASD or arrow keys to move

- use LShift to sprint

Notes:

This game was made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
